admiral-kilian-commander-nexus.author: Armada Nexus
admiral-kilian-commander-nexus.name: Admiral Kilian
admiral-kilian-commander-nexus.ability:
While a friendly ship is perfoming a non-**ignition**, non-`salvo` attack against a ship, before it gathers dice, it may replace 1 die in its battery armament with a red die.
If that ship has the *Bombard* tag, it may replace up to 2 dice instead.

depa-billaba-officer-nexus.author: Armada Nexus
depa-billaba-officer-nexus.name: Depa Billaba
depa-billaba-officer-nexus.ability: While attacking an enemy ship, you may reroll 1 die for each exhausted defense token you have.

general-romodi-officer-nexus.author: Armada Nexus
general-romodi-officer-nexus.name: General Romodi
general-romodi-officer-nexus.ability:
Non-huge ship only.
When attacking a squadron, your attacks cannot be obstructed.

darth-maul-commander-scum-nexus.author: Armada Nexus
darth-maul-commander-scum-nexus.release: Armada Nexus Scum and Villainy Wave 1
darth-maul-commander-scum-nexus.name: Darth Maul {Scum}
darth-maul-commander-scum-nexus.ability: While a friendly ship is attacking, it may spend 1 of its defense tokens. If it does, it may exhaust a matching defense token on the defender.

hondo-ohnaka-commander-scum-nexus.author: Armada Nexus
hondo-ohnaka-commander-scum-nexus.release: Armada Nexus Scum and Villainy Wave 1
hondo-ohnaka-commander-scum-nexus.name: Hondo Ohnaka {Scum}
hondo-ohnaka-commander-scum-nexus.ability:
Before an enemy ship at distance 1-5 of a friendly ship would gain a command token, you may exhaust this card to assign it to that friendly ship instead.
At the start of the Ship Phase, you may exhaust this card to discard any number of command tokens from friendly ships and assign that number of matching raid tokens to enemy ship at distance 1-5.

jerid-sykes-commander-scum-nexus.author: Armada Nexus
jerid-sykes-commander-scum-nexus.release: Armada Nexus Scum and Villainy Wave 2
jerid-sykes-commander-scum-nexus.name: Jerid Sykes {Scum}
jerid-sykes-commander-scum-nexus.ability: When a friendly squadron begins its activation at distance 1-2 of a friendly ship, it gains **Rogue** until the end of its activation.

pre-vizsla-commander-scum-nexus.author: Armada Nexus
pre-vizsla-commander-scum-nexus.release: Armada Nexus Scum and Villainy Wave 2
pre-vizsla-commander-scum-nexus.name: Pre Vizsla {Scum}
pre-vizsla-commander-scum-nexus.ability:
While attacking a ship, a friendly ship may add 1 die of any color to its attack pool. If it does, choose and cancel 1 die.
If that ship has the tag *Mandalorian*, do not cancel any dice instead.

prince-xizor-commander-scum-nexus.author: Armada Nexus
prince-xizor-commander-scum-nexus.release: Armada Nexus Scum and Villainy Wave 1
prince-xizor-commander-scum-nexus.name: Prince Xizor {Scum}
prince-xizor-commander-scum-nexus.ability: While defending, before a friendly ship would be dealt 1 or more damage cards, you may deal 1 of those damage cards to another friendly ship at distance 1-4 of the defender.

tyber-zann-commander-scum-nexus.author: Armada Nexus
tyber-zann-commander-scum-nexus.release: Armada Nexus Scum and Villainy Wave 2
tyber-zann-commander-scum-nexus.name: Tyber Zann {Scum}
tyber-zann-commander-scum-nexus.ability: At the start of each Ship Phase, you may reveal and discard 1 command token from this card. If you do, until the end of the round, when a friendly ship resolves a matching command, it may gain 1 command token of its choice. When an enemy ship resolves a matching command, it gains 1 raid token of its choice.

smugglers-cache-scum-nexus.author: Armada Nexus
smugglers-cache-scum-nexus.release: Armada Nexus Scum and Villainy Wave 1
smugglers-cache-scum-nexus.name: Smuggler's Cache {Scum}
smugglers-cache-scum-nexus.ability: You may spend or discard command dials from this card as if they were matching command tokens assigned to your ship.

the-big-score-scum-nexus.author: Armada Nexus
the-big-score-scum-nexus.release: Armada Nexus Scum and Villainy Wave 2
the-big-score-scum-nexus.name: The Big Score {Scum}
the-big-score-scum-nexus.ability:
While defending, after rolling dice, if there are two or more dice in the attack pool, the attacker must choose and cancel 1 die with a :hit: or :crit: icon on its face, if able.
When an enemy ship at close range reveals a command, it may discard a :squadron: dial or token to discard this card and deal you two face-down damage cards.

ambush-scum-nexus.author: Armada Nexus
ambush-scum-nexus.release: Armada Nexus Scum and Villainy Wave 2
ambush-scum-nexus.name: Ambush {Scum}
ambush-scum-nexus.ability: While deploying fleets, you may deploy a number of your friendly squadrons up to your squadron value within distance 1 of obstacles. Squadrons must be placed beyond distance 1-5 of all enemy ships and squadrons, and beyond distance 1-5 of the opponent's board edge.

boarding-grapples-scum-nexus.author: Armada Nexus
boarding-grapples-scum-nexus.release: Armada Nexus Scum and Villainy Wave 1
boarding-grapples-scum-nexus.name: Boarding Grapples {Scum}
boarding-grapples-scum-nexus.ability:
*Pirate only.*
Any :weapons-team-offensive-retro: upgrade you equip may be used at close-medium range.
Gain 1 :offensive-retro: icon in your upgrade bar.

shield-leecher-scum-nexus.author: Armada Nexus
shield-leecher-scum-nexus.release: Armada Nexus Scum and Villainy Wave 2
shield-leecher-scum-nexus.name: Shield Leecher {Scum}
shield-leecher-scum-nexus.ability: After attacking, if the defender suffered at least 1 damage to shields, you may exhaust this card to gain 1 :confire: or :repair: token (if able).

jiro-officer-scum-nexus.author: Armada Nexus
jiro-officer-scum-nexus.release: Armada Nexus Scum and Villainy Wave 1
jiro-officer-scum-nexus.name: Jiro {Scum}
jiro-officer-scum-nexus.ability:
*Pirate only.*
When you activate, a friendly ship at distance 1-5 may discard 1 of its :commander: or :officer: cards (other than Jiro) to recover 1 of your discarded defense tokens.

savage-oppress-officer-scum-nexus.author: Armada Nexus
savage-oppress-officer-scum-nexus.release: Armada Nexus Scum and Villainy Wave 1
savage-oppress-officer-scum-nexus.name: Savage Oppress {Scum}
savage-oppress-officer-scum-nexus.ability: While attacking, if at least 1 of your defense tokens is exhausted or discarded, you may add 1 die of any color to the attack.

silri-officer-scum-nexus.author: Armada Nexus
silri-officer-scum-nexus.release: Armada Nexus Scum and Villainy Wave 2
silri-officer-scum-nexus.name: Silri {Scum}
silri-officer-scum-nexus.ability: After a ship at distance 1-5 gains a raid token, you may exhaust this card. If you do, that ship gains 1 additional raid token of its choice.

urai-fen-officer-scum-nexus.author: Armada Nexus
urai-fen-officer-scum-nexus.release: Armada Nexus Scum and Villainy Wave 2
urai-fen-officer-scum-nexus.name: Urai Fen {Scum}
urai-fen-officer-scum-nexus.ability: When a friendly squadron at distance 1-5 would suffer damage other than from an attack, you may discard a token from this card to reduce the damage total by 1.

ziton-moj-officer-scum-nexus.author: Armada Nexus
ziton-moj-officer-scum-nexus.release: Armada Nexus Scum and Villainy Wave 1
ziton-moj-officer-scum-nexus.name: Ziton Moj {Scum}
ziton-moj-officer-scum-nexus.ability: When you would be dealt a facedown damage card, you may choose for it to be faceup. If you do, flip 1 damage card facedown on another friendly ship at distance 1-4. If it is their only damage card, discard it.

super-heavy-concussion-missiles-scum-nex.author: Armada Nexus
super-heavy-concussion-missiles-scum-nex.release: Armada Nexus Scum and Villainy Wave 2
super-heavy-concussion-missiles-scum-nex.name: Super-Heavy Concussion Missiles {Scum}
super-heavy-concussion-missiles-scum-nex.ability:
*Modification* *Mandalorian only.* *Non-small ship only.*
**Ignition[Medium]**
Your printed squadron value is reduced by 2 to a minimum of 1. Each of your front, left, or right arcs is also a special firing arc. You have a special black battery armament of 4 black dice. After you place your targeting token, exhaust this card. While this card is exhausted, you cannot place targeting tokens.

pirate-crew-scum-nexus.author: Armada Nexus
pirate-crew-scum-nexus.release: Armada Nexus Scum and Villainy Wave 1
pirate-crew-scum-nexus.name: Pirate Crew {Scum}
pirate-crew-scum-nexus.ability:
*Pirate only.*
 When a friendly ship at distance 1-5 gains a command token, you may exhaust this card to gain 1 command token matching the one on this card.

vanity-price-title-scum-nexus.author: Armada Nexus
vanity-price-title-scum-nexus.release: Armada Nexus Scum and Villainy Wave 1
vanity-price-title-scum-nexus.name: Vanity Price {Scum}
vanity-price-title-scum-nexus.ability:
Your printed anti-squadron armament is increased by 1 black die.
While attacking a squadron, you may spend 1 die with a :crit: icon to toggle it's activation slider to the activated side.

wild-karrde-title-scum-nexus.author: Armada Nexus
wild-karrde-title-scum-nexus.release: Armada Nexus Scum and Villainy Wave 1
wild-karrde-title-scum-nexus.name: Wild Karrde {Scum}
wild-karrde-title-scum-nexus.ability: Your printed battery armament for your front hull zone is increased by 1 blue die.

dikut-title-scum-nexus.author: Armada Nexus
dikut-title-scum-nexus.release: Armada Nexus Scum and Villainy Wave 2
dikut-title-scum-nexus.name: Di'Kut {Scum}
dikut-title-scum-nexus.ability: After you resolve a command dial, you may exhaust this card to gain a token matching that command dial.

aden-title-scum-nexus.author: Armada Nexus
aden-title-scum-nexus.release: Armada Nexus Scum and Villainy Wave 2
aden-title-scum-nexus.name: A'Den {Scum}
aden-title-scum-nexus.ability: Your squadron value is increased by 1. You cannot equip :ioncannon: upgrades.

flatline-title-scum-nexus.author: Armada Nexus
flatline-title-scum-nexus.release: Armada Nexus Scum and Villainy Wave 1
flatline-title-scum-nexus.name: Flatline {Scum}
flatline-title-scum-nexus.ability:
Treat your printed battery armament in your rear hull zone as 1 blue and 1 black die.
After you deploy, gain 1 :salvo: defense token.

poison-moon-title-scum-nexus.author: Armada Nexus
poison-moon-title-scum-nexus.release: Armada Nexus Scum and Villainy Wave 1
poison-moon-title-scum-nexus.name: Poison Moon {Scum}
poison-moon-title-scum-nexus.ability: When you reveal a command dial, you may discard this card. If you do, until the end of the round, black dice in your battery armament may be used at medium range and blue dice in your battery armament may be used at long range.

gratua-title-scum-nexus.author: Armada Nexus
gratua-title-scum-nexus.release: Armada Nexus Scum and Villainy Wave 2
gratua-title-scum-nexus.name: Gratua {Scum}
gratua-title-scum-nexus.ability:
After you deploy, gain 1 :contain: token.
 While defending, you may spend a :contain: token to resolve the :redirect: defense effect. You cannot resolve the :redirect: defense effect more than once per attack.

parjai-iv-title-scum-nexus.author: Armada Nexus
parjai-iv-title-scum-nexus.release: Armada Nexus Scum and Villainy Wave 2
parjai-iv-title-scum-nexus.name: Parjai IV {Scum}
parjai-iv-title-scum-nexus.ability:
:squadron: : After a squadron you activate destroys an enemy ship or squadron, that squadron recovers 1 hull point.
After you destroy an enemy ship, you may discard one of your facedown damage cards.

anvil-title-scum-nexus.author: Armada Nexus
anvil-title-scum-nexus.release: Armada Nexus Scum and Villainy Wave 2
anvil-title-scum-nexus.name: Anvil {Scum}
anvil-title-scum-nexus.ability: After gathering dice for a :salvo: attack, you may change the color of any number of dice in the attack pool.

end-of-days-title-scum-nexus.author: Armada Nexus
end-of-days-title-scum-nexus.release: Armada Nexus Scum and Villainy Wave 2
end-of-days-title-scum-nexus.name: End of Days {Scum}
end-of-days-title-scum-nexus.ability: Gain 1 :ordnance: icon in your upgrade bar.

charybdis-title-scum-nexus.author: Armada Nexus
charybdis-title-scum-nexus.release: Armada Nexus Scum and Villainy Wave 1
charybdis-title-scum-nexus.name: Charybdis {Scum}
charybdis-title-scum-nexus.ability: The printed shield values of your front, left, and right hull zones are increased by 1.

savrip-title-scum-nexus.author: Armada Nexus
savrip-title-scum-nexus.release: Armada Nexus Scum and Villainy Wave 1
savrip-title-scum-nexus.name: Savrip {Scum}
savrip-title-scum-nexus.ability:
While attacking, if your speed is 0 or 1 and this is your first attack during your activation, you may add 2 dice of any color to your attack pool.
If you do, you cannot attack again during this activation.

redhawk-title-scum-nexus.author: Armada Nexus
redhawk-title-scum-nexus.release: Armada Nexus Scum and Villainy Wave 1
redhawk-title-scum-nexus.name: Redhawk {Scum}
redhawk-title-scum-nexus.ability:
You gain 1 :turbolaser: icon in your upgrade bar.
You lose 1 :defensive-retro: icon in your upgrade bar.

omzes-incredible-traveling-starport-titl.author: Armada Nexus
omzes-incredible-traveling-starport-titl.release: Armada Nexus Scum and Villainy Wave 1
omzes-incredible-traveling-starport-titl.name: Omze's Incredible Traveling Starport {Scum}
omzes-incredible-traveling-starport-titl.ability:
You can be assigned any number of command tokens of any types.
When a friendly ship at distance 1-5 reveals a command dial, it may discard 1 command token assigned to you to gain a matching command token.

tibanna-disruptors-scum-nexus.author: Armada Nexus
tibanna-disruptors-scum-nexus.release: Armada Nexus Scum and Villainy Wave 1
tibanna-disruptors-scum-nexus.name: Tibanna Disruptors {Scum}
tibanna-disruptors-scum-nexus.ability: **RED :crit:**: Look at the top 2 damage cards of the defender's damage deck. Deal 1 of them faceup to the defender and discard the other. Then suffer 2 damage.

gun-captains-scum-nexus.author: Armada Nexus
gun-captains-scum-nexus.release: Armada Nexus Scum and Villainy Wave 2
gun-captains-scum-nexus.name: Gun Captains {Scum}
gun-captains-scum-nexus.ability: While attacking, you may reroll 1 die for each readied defense token on the defender.

author: Armada Nexus
ion-pulse-emitter-nexus.name: Ion Pulse Emitter
ion-pulse-emitter-nexus.ability:
Modification.
Ignition [Long]
When you perform an ignition attack, you may exhaust this card and spend a defense token. If you do, after the modify dice step, discard all attack dice. For each matching die face, resolve the following effects:
:hit:: The defending hull zone loses 1 shield.
:crit:: Each hull zone adjacent to the defending hull zone loses 1 shield.

author: Armada Nexus
ionic-plasma-rotors-nexus.name: Ionic Plasma Rotors
ionic-plasma-rotors-nexus.ability:
Modification.
Ignition [Long]
Ignition,:crit:: Toggle the activation slider for each squadron within distance 1-2 of the defender to the activated side.

author: Armada Nexus
kyber-beam-cannon-nexus.name: Kyber Beam Cannon
kyber-beam-cannon-nexus.ability:
Modification. "Beam" only.
Ignition [Long]
Treat your special battery dice pool as 9 black dice. You cannot add a non-black die to this attack.
While performing an ignition attack, all damage cards are dealt faceup. After you perform an ignition attack, discard this card.

author: Armada Nexus
blue-hawk-title-nexus.name: Blue Hawk
blue-hawk-title-nexus.ability:
Treat your rear hull zone's printed battery armament as 2 blue dice.
You gain 1 :weapons-team: icon in your upgrade bar.

author: Armada Nexus
furious-title-nexus.name: Furious
furious-title-nexus.ability: While attacking a squadron, each of your unspent :accuracy: icons add 1 damage to the damage total.

author: Armada Nexus
pulsar-title-nexus.name: Pulsar
pulsar-title-nexus.ability:
You gain 1 :ordnance: upgrade in your upgrade bar. You may only equip one :offensive-retro: upgrade.
At the end of the Squadron Phase, you may attack 1 enemy squadron at distance 1 with your printed anti-squadron armament. You cannot add dice to this attack.

author: Armada Nexus
condor-title-nexus.name: Condor
condor-title-nexus.ability: :squadron:: Each squadron you activate, up to your squadron value, that has only 1 die in its battery armament may add 1 red die to its attack pool when attacking a ship.

author: Skyhammer
shadow-title-nexus.name: Shadow
shadow-title-nexus.ability: While a friendly ship at distance 1-2 is the target of an attack at long or extreme range, the attack is treated as obstructed.

author: Armada Nexus
devastation-title-nexus.name: Devastation
devastation-title-nexus.ability:
Beam only.
When you would discard a :super-weapon: card on the equipped ship, you may discard this card instead.

author: Armada Nexus
subjugator-title-nexus.name: Subjugator
subjugator-title-nexus.ability:
After you deploy, you must replace 1 of your defense tokens with a :redirect: defense token.
When you resolve the :redirect: effect, you may redirect damage to 1 of your auxiliary hull zones, even if it is not adjacent to the defending hull zone.

author: Armada Nexus
malevolence-title-nexus.name: Malevolence
malevolence-title-nexus.ability:
Ion only.
Ignition,:crit:: Cancel all attack dice and reduce the defender's speed to 0, then discard this card.

precision-turbolaser-turrets-nexus.author: Armada Nexus
precision-turbolaser-turrets-nexus.name: Precision Turbolaser Turrets
precision-turbolaser-turrets-nexus.ability: While performing a non-IGNITION attack against a ship, during the Spend Defense Tokens step, if a die would be removed from the attack pool, the defender must choose to keep or reroll that die instead.
